tool.help:
.. class:: infomark.
**What it does**
This tool takes a Schrodinger Protein Descriptors file file, such as generated by the ``Schrodinger Protein Descriptors`` tool, and calculates [Therapeutic Antibody Developability Analysis (TA-DA)](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/19420862.2022.2080628#d1e434) scores from AbbVie.
